description: ff. 23. 210 x 155; 145 x 90 mm. 15 lin. the author completed his work 4 Rabīʻ II, 1131; probably autograph. Incip.: ... قوله ىعنى اشراط الساعة تفسىر للبعض کما هو ظاهر

title: Ajzal al-kalām fī baʻḍ āyāt al-qiyām.
